home.name: Mradul Sharma
home.compactAbout: Accomplished Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience in Laravel, React, and Node.js. Skilled in building secure, scalable web applications using modern technologies. Strong background in API integration, responsive design, and performance optimization. Adept at leading development teams, writing clean code, and delivering projects efficiently. Passionate about innovation and continuous learning.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or have any queries? Let's connect.

testimonials.name: Arjun Mehta
testimonials.comment: Mradul's expertise in Laravel and system architecture was pivotal for our core migration. His dedication to clean code and performance is unmatched.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.comment: Working with Mradul was a breeze. He translated complex requirements into a seamless React front-end that our users absolutely love. A true professional.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.comment: His ability to handle full-cycle development from AWS deployment to database optimization has been impressive. A versatile and reliable technical leader.
